title: Implement Open Evidence API schema
body: Use `evidence-schema.json` to define and validate external evidence formats from platforms like Vanta or Fieldguide.

title: Build Evidence Auto-Labeler (Python)
body: Develop the script located in `tools/evidence-auto-labeler/labeler.py` to classify and tag uploaded files automatically.

title: Develop SAQ-A Template Kit
body: Deliver editable SAQ-A assessment packages with mapped templates and folder hierarchy.

title: Develop SAQ-D Template Kit
body: Deliver editable SAQ-D assessment packages with mapped templates and folder hierarchy.

title: Create Notion Workspace Kit
body: Use the contents in `notion-template-kit/` to create a usable Notion assessment starter.

title: Design Starter CLI Tool
body: Enable teams to scaffold new PCI assessments with a command-line interface tool based on repo metadata.
